history.narrative: Law 5-153 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-225, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Cable Television. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 23, 1984, and November 7, 1984, respectively. Disapproved by the Mayor on November 30, 1984, the Bill was reenacted by the Council on December 4, 1984, assigned Act No. 5-217 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for review.
